casebody.data:
IN RE Craig Melvin SCHAFER, Petitioner. No. 19-5721 Supreme Court of the United States. November 4, 2019

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. petitioner allowed until November 25, 2019, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
